definitions.label_groups: transitive , colloquial , used mainly in passive form , now rare

definitions.definition: To act as a servant for senior students in many British boarding schools .
label_groups: intransitive , UK , Ireland , education , historical , colloquial

definitions.definition: To have (a younger student ) act as a servant in this way.
definitions.label_groups: transitive , UK , Ireland , education , historical , colloquial

definitions.definition: To work hard, especially on menial chores.

main_definition: ( transitive , colloquial , used mainly in passive form , now rare ) To make exhausted , tired out.
secondary_definitions: ( intransitive , colloquial , now rare ) To droop; to tire.
( intransitive , UK , Ireland , education , historical , colloquial ) (of a younger student ) To act as a servant for senior students in many British boarding schools .
( transitive , UK , Ireland , education , historical , colloquial ) To have (a younger student ) act as a servant in this way.
( intransitive , UK , Ireland , now rare ) To work hard, especially on menial chores.
